name: KEL Reaper of Entropy
description: Remember all those games in which you start in a village and you have to prove your worth by clearing the local crypt of undead skeletons? What if you woke up as one of those skeletons instead of the wannabe hero?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or better Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3-compatible video card, 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 650 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Too short, no voice acting, and the charater moves too slow. Fun idea but there needs to be more to a game than 'make friends with all the villiagers..... do villagers tasks..... so now kill all the villagers off'.
I was having trouble getting the last villager killed until I realised I could do it with the console.  10/10
